name: SNOCKER
description:
Snake Soccer.
Snocker.

This game was made in less than 48 hours for the Mini Jam 86. The theme was "Sport" with an added limitation of "No stopping".

  • This is a Local-Multiplayer Snake Soccer Game for 2-4 players.
  • Your Snake moves forward on its own.
  • Steer Left/Right to turn.
  • Press Forward to go faster.
  • Buttons vary for each player.
  • Controls are shown in the Character Selection.

All sounds licensed through Envato Elements.
